Text: Kirton is a village and a civil parish in the shire county of Suffolk, England, situated off the A14 road, about 4.5 km from Felixstowe and around 10 km from Ipswich.

Text: Kirton, Suffolk:  The closest train station to Kirton is Trimley.

Text: Kirton, Suffolk:  According to the 2011 census, Kirton had a population of 1,146.

Text: Kirton, Suffolk:  The village of Kirton covers a total area of 8.3 km2 .

<Text: Kirton, Suffolk:  As the county of Suffolk lacks quarries, many of the buildings are made from flint, clay and timber.>
